detaileddescription.para: Check Kramers-Kronig relation for retarded self-energy and retarded component of K1r by computing the real part from the imaginary part via Kramers-Kronig. The result can be compared to the real part obtained from the flow.

Take hdf5 file, compute the susceptibilities from it and save them to the hdf5 file. Postprocessed K1: K1r = Γ0∘Π_r∘Γ0 + Γ0∘Π_r∘Γ∘Π_r∘Γ_0 = Γ0∘Π_r∘(Γ0 + Γ∘Π_r∘Γ_0) This works because K1r+K2r ∈ Γ∘Π_r∘Γ_0 (zero K2' or K3)
filename

inbodydescription.para: corrections to the bare bubble from the purely dynamical SE in 2. order:
